name: Notebook
description: Our notebook is the perfect blend of power and portability. With an elegant design and exceptional performance, it's ideal for work or on-the-go entertainment. Featuring a crisp display and a comfortable keyboard, you'll have a top-tier computing experience.

name: Smartphone
description: Our smartphone delivers the best in mobile technology. With a high-resolution camera, a fast processor, and a vibrant screen, you can capture incredible moments and enjoy apps and media with ease. It's the perfect companion for the digital lifestyle.

name: Tablet
description: Our tablet is your window to the digital world. With a high-quality touch screen and agile performance, it's perfect for web browsing, video watching, gaming, and more. Its portability makes it convenient for use anywhere.

name: Digital Camera
description: Our digital camera is a gateway to capturing life's precious moments. With high-resolution imaging and advanced features, it's your perfect companion for photography. Whether you're a professional or an enthusiast, this camera delivers stunning shots and allows you to express your creativity.

name: Bluetooth Headphones
description: Our Bluetooth headphones redefine your audio experience. With wireless connectivity, high-fidelity sound, and comfortable over-ear design, they are perfect for music lovers and audiophiles. You can enjoy your favourite tunes and podcasts with the freedom of wireless convenience, making them a must-have accessory for your daily life.
